001package com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.storage.data_repository;
002
003import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
004import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
005
006import com.google.gson.Gson;
007import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.service.model.ApplicationInstance;
008import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.Claim;
009import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.ClaimReference;
010import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.contracts.StorageManagerContract;
011import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.storage.StorageErrorHandler;
012import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.storage.StorageKeys;
013import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.regions.PingOneRegion;
014
015import java.util.ArrayList;
016import java.util.Comparator;
017import java.util.HashMap;
018import java.util.HashSet;
019import java.util.List;
020import java.util.Map;
021import java.util.Set;
022import java.util.stream.Collectors;
023
024import javax.inject.Singleton;
025
026@Singleton
027public class DataRepositoryImpl implements DataRepository {
028
029    public static final String TAG = DataRepositoryImpl.class.getCanonicalName();
030
031    private StorageManagerContract storageManager;
032
033    private Set<String> credentialIds;
034    private Set<String> credentialReferenceIds;
035    private Set<PingOneRegion> regions;
036
037    private final MutableLiveData<List<Claim>> claimsLiveData = new MutableLiveData<>();
038
039    private final Map<String, Claim> credentials = new HashMap<>();
040    private final Map<String, ClaimReference> credentialReferences = new HashMap<>();
041
042    public DataRepositoryImpl(StorageManagerContract storageManager) {
043        init(storageManager);
044    }
045
046    @Override
047    public void init(StorageManagerContract storageManager) {
048        this.storageManager = storageManager;
049        reload();
050    }
051
052    @Override
053    public List<Claim> getAllCredentials() {
054        credentials.clear();
055        credentials.putAll(
056                credentialIds.stream()
057                        .map(id -> storageManager.getClaim(id))
058                        .collect(Collectors.toMap(claim -> claim.getId().toString(), claim -> claim))
059        );
060
061        return credentials.values().stream()
062                .sorted(Comparator.comparing(Claim::getCreateDate, Comparator.nullsLast(Comparator.reverseOrder())))
063                .collect(Collectors.toList());
064    }
065
066    @Override
067    public MutableLiveData<List<Claim>> subscribeCredentialsChange() {
068        return claimsLiveData;
069    }
070
071    @Override
072    public void saveCredential(Claim credential) {
073        storageManager.saveClaim(credential);
074        credentials.put(credential.getId().toString(), credential);
075        updateCredentials();
076        saveClaimId(credential.getId().toString());
077    }
078
079    @Override
080    public Claim getCredential(String id) {
081        Claim credential = storageManager.getClaim(id);
082
083        if (credential != null) {
084            return credential;
085        }
086
087        credential = storageManager.getClaim(id);
088        if (credential != null) {
089            credentials.put(id, credential);
090            return credential;
091        }
092
093        return null;
094    }
095
096    @Override
097    public void deleteCredential(String id) {
098        storageManager.deleteClaim(id);
099        credentials.remove(id);
100        updateCredentials();
101        removeClaimId(id);
102    }
103
104    @Override
105    public void saveCredentialReference(ClaimReference credentialReference) {
106        storageManager.saveClaimReference(credentialReference);
107        saveCredentialReferenceId(credentialReference.getId().toString());
108    }
109
110    @Override
111    public ClaimReference getCredentialReference(String id) {
112        ClaimReference credentialReference = credentialReferences.get(id);
113        if (credentialReference != null) {
114            return credentialReference;
115        }
116
117        credentialReference = storageManager.getClaimReference(id);
118        if (credentialReference != null) {
119            credentialReferences.put(id, credentialReference);
120            return credentialReference;
121        }
122
123        return null;
124    }
125
126    @Override
127    public boolean isCredentialRevoked(String credentialId) {
128        return credentialReferenceIds.contains(credentialId);
129    }
130
131    @Override
132    public void saveCredentialIds(Set<String> credentialIds) {
133        storageManager.saveStringSet(credentialIds, StorageKeys.CLAIMS_STORAGE_KEY);
134    }
135
136    @Override
137    public void saveCredentialReferenceIds(Set<String> credentialReferenceIds) {
138        storageManager.saveStringSet(credentialReferenceIds, StorageKeys.REVOKED_CLAIMS_STORAGE_KEY);
139    }
140
141    @Override
142    public Set<PingOneRegion> getRegions() {
143        return regions;
144    }
145
146    @Override
147    public void saveRegions(Set<PingOneRegion> pingOneRegions) {
148        Gson gson = new Gson();
149        Set<String> regionsSet = pingOneRegions.stream().map(gson::toJson).collect(Collectors.toSet());
150        storageManager.saveStringSet(regionsSet, StorageKeys.REGIONS_STORAGE_KEY);
151    }
152
153    @Override
154    public void setStorageErrorHandler(StorageErrorHandler storageErrorHandler) {
155        storageManager.setStorageErrorHandler(storageErrorHandler);
156    }
157
158    @Override
159    public StorageErrorHandler getStorageErrorHandler() {
160        return storageManager.getStorageErrorHandler();
161    }
162
163    @Override
164    public void saveApplicationInstance(PingOneRegion walletRegion, ApplicationInstance applicationInstance) {
165        storageManager.saveApplicationInstance(walletRegion, applicationInstance);
166        regions.add(walletRegion);
167        saveRegions(regions);
168    }
169
170    @Override
171    public ApplicationInstance getApplicationInstance() {
172        return storageManager.getApplicationInstance();
173    }
174
175    @Override
176    public ApplicationInstance getApplicationInstance(PingOneRegion walletRegion) {
177        return storageManager.getApplicationInstance(walletRegion);
178    }
179
180    @Override
181    public void saveString(String str, String key) {
182        storageManager.saveString(str, key);
183    }
184
185    @Override
186    public String getString(String key) {
187        return storageManager.getString(key);
188    }
189
190    @Override
191    public void saveStringSet(Set<String> set, String key) {
192        storageManager.saveStringSet(set, key);
193    }
194
195    @Override
196    public Set<String> getStringSet(String key) {
197        return storageManager.getStringSet(key);
198    }
199
200    private void reload() {
201        credentialIds = storageManager.getStringSet(StorageKeys.CLAIMS_STORAGE_KEY);
202        if (credentialIds == null) {
203            credentialIds = new HashSet<>();
204        }
205        credentialReferenceIds = storageManager.getStringSet(StorageKeys.REVOKED_CLAIMS_STORAGE_KEY);
206        getAllCredentials();
207        updateCredentials();
208        Gson gson = new Gson();
209        Set<String> regionsSet = storageManager.getStringSet(StorageKeys.REGIONS_STORAGE_KEY);
210        if (regionsSet != null) {
211            this.regions = regionsSet.stream()
212                    .map(region -> gson.fromJson(region, PingOneRegion.class))
213                    .collect(Collectors.toSet());
214        } else {
215            regions = new HashSet<>();
216        }
217    }
218
219    private void updateCredentials() {
220        List<Claim> claims = new ArrayList<>(credentials.values());
221        claimsLiveData.postValue(claims);
222    }
223
224    private void saveCredentialReferenceId(String id) {
225        credentialReferenceIds.add(id);
226        saveCredentialReferenceIds(credentialReferenceIds);
227    }
228
229    private void saveClaimId(String id) {
230        credentialIds.add(id);
231        saveCredentialIds(credentialIds);
232    }
233
234    private void removeClaimId(@NonNull final String cardId) {
235        credentialIds.remove(cardId);
236        saveCredentialIds(credentialIds);
237    }
238
239}
